property.name: targetHost
property.description: Webmethods target host to deploy built to

property.name: project
property.description: Name of the project from which the build you are deploying was created.

property.name: newCandidateName
property.description: Name to use for a new deployment candidate. The name can be up to 32-characters long and can include any character that is valid for a file name in your operating system.

property.name: newCandidateDescription
property.description: Brief description of the new deployment candidate. The description length has no limit and can include any character that is valid for a file name in your operating system.

property.name: build
property.description: Name of the project build to deploy

property.name: map
property.description: Name of the deployment map that identifies the target Integration Servers to which to deploy the items in the selected project build.
